name: Eton Mess Ice-cream Sandwich Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: strawberry, meringue nests, vanilla ice cream
recipeInstructionSteps: Cut the tops off of strawberries and apply to the bottom of two pieces of meringue.
Place a large scoop of ice cream on top of the strawberry side of one meringue and cover with second meringue to create a sandwich.
